sentences.sContent: I hope this will reinforce Indonesian determination to deal with this kind of threat.
sentences.sCn: 我希望这会加强印度尼西亚对付这类威胁的决心。

sentences.sContent: Both sides have been reinforcing their positions after yesterday's fierce fighting.
sentences.sCn: 在昨天的激战后，双方一直在增援各自的阵地。

sentences.sContent: ...Technological change may well reinforce that shift: the skills that complement computers...
...Break the tension with smiles and humor to reinforce the idea that this is friendly discourse and that all are working toward a common goal...
...It is about building better communities and organizations that enhance us as individuals and reinforce our shared humanity...

words.tran: 增强剂；加强件；增强材料；强化刺激

trans.tranOther: to give support to an opinion, idea, or feeling, and make it stronger
